website_summaries.verdict: If you want a well-rounded set of Morphe brushes for a mid-range price, this is the one to get. Despite a few minor flaws, many owners say they are the best they've ever used.
pros: A large, professional-grade set with 18 vegan brushes
Perfect combination of soft yet sturdy bristles suited for numerous makeup application needs
cons: A few reports of handles that broke and bristles that fell out after normal use

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used cheap synthetic brushes for my makeup. I did some research and read/saw some reviews and decided to try morphe brushes. I noticed a huge difference immediately! These brushes are so soft and gentle on my skin. My old brushes were scratchy and harsh! My new morphe brushes also distribute my makeup better and clean easier! I'm so happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LucyJo

customer_reviews.title: Not Morphe.
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are okay. Not great, but decent. They, however, are definitely not Morphe. They do not have the Morphe numbers on them, and my true Morphe brushes are much, MUCH softer. These are okay for beginners, but if you have experience with actual name brand brushes, don’t get these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Raychel

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because it made a "best of" list and, unlike others on the list, it didn't break the bank. The set comes in a black patent leather case that I would carry as a clutch if I could. The brushes themselves are a little on the large side but do the job and look really nice while doing it. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stacye

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice brushes, they came in a roll that I didnt care for. The roll is shiney black plastic that looked cheap. The brushes however were nice.
customer_reviews.author: WMS

customer_reviews.title: The brush was nice and soft but I wish they'd label the brushes ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush was nice and soft but I wish they'd label the brushes like the other morphe brushes. Also I found I only used maybe about 4 or 5 of the brushes. I wish there were more brushes for blending the eye. Also there were no foundation brush in the set or any brow pens. It's just ok.
customer_reviews.author: kat sou

customer_reviews.title: Knock off but still nice
customer_reviews.text: Its a knock off but its still good. They are pretty nice brushes and cute for a gift since it comes in the pouch
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and she was ecstatic - Nice quality and great variety of brushes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It applies the makeup on the skin good enough to not get the hose again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have label for each brush
customer_reviews.text: Wish each brush labeled what it should be used for.

customer_reviews.title: it’s very bad that it’s painful to use 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’s the original one...it’s very bad that it’s painful to use 👎🏽

customer_reviews.title: Deal on quality makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: Great set of quality makeup brushes. Each brush is marked with Morph, but no numbers. Love the carrying case that comes with the brushes.

customer_reviews.title: I like the set but the fan brush is too wide ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but the fan brush is too wide and little bit of strands fell out after one wash. Also the brushes are not labeled just has brand on it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. Great value. Bought for a gift and she LOVED IT.

customer_reviews.title: I expected better
customer_reviews.text: One of my brushes fell apart after 2 washes. Unacceptable Morphe.

customer_reviews.text: pleasantly surprised.the brushes are exactly what was hoped for, very soft.

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: good quality for the price. it's only been a few weeks, but i'd say the brushes are comparable to 'high-end' ones you'd buy from a local beauty mart...and these are much more affordably priced. the case is pretty cheaply made, but i didn't expect much there.
customer_reviews.author: jajajass

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted Vegan brushes, because the real hair ones tend to cause me to break out, plus the other synthetic ones I feel like they scratch my face. These are soo soft and luxurious. I love the morphe eye shadows and now these brushes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they fall apart. It was a gift and they ...
customer_reviews.text: they fall apart. It was a gift and they are not well made. The bristles fall out and they are very cheap. I expected more
customer_reviews.author: fawesome85

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed when I initially opened the package because the brush ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I initially opened the package because the brush pictured in the photo was not the brush set I received. I chose this particular brush set because of its quality and for the black and white bristles. Instead I got brushes that looked and felt mediocre and brushes that looked completely different from this picture. I will not be purchasing from this seller or this brand anymore. Something told me I should have saved my money and purchased the Sigma brushes that are of great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... VERY SORRY MISTAKE ON PREVOUS REVIEW THIS IS AUTHRNTIC GREAT ITEM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to buy!
customer_reviews.text: So very happy with product and receiving products so quickly!

customer_reviews.title: I just reseved the brushes was super excited but just noticed that the 18 piece set ...
customer_reviews.text: I just reseved the brushes was super excited but just noticed that the 18 piece set i ordered only came with 11 brushes??
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: These brushes came super quick! The brushes are softer than my sigma brushes and work perfectly. The packaging was good too, nothing was broken. Every brush had an individual plastic seal around the hairs of the brush. Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too shiny, I didnt believe they were real that's why I returned them.

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t original Morphe, I looked too quick as ...
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t original Morphe, I looked too quick as I brought them. If you want the real deal, go to morphe.com
customer_reviews.author: anabel bordas

customer_reviews.title: Great collection
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are a beautiful set. I'm new to using brushes for makeup application. So my daughter is very excited about them. I will be ordering her a set as well.

customer_reviews.title: For the wifey
customer_reviews.text: Go these for my wife for Christmas. She really loves morphe and needed her own set of brushes. I don't know jack about make up but these were sold out on the morphe website so I got them here. All is well.
customer_reviews.author: Elimelec (IgaHanzo88)

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift to my daughter who is a make-up guru. She absolutely loves these brushes and has said there are none better.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brush set for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect brush set! AND easy to use as well as clean!

customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my wife, she loves them! Tons of brushes, and they fold up nicely

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: at first they werent too great but after i washed them i fell in love i even bought another set to take when i travel

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Good brushes but they smell like wet paint. Super super strong smell. Some of the brushes were misshapen due to shipping.

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loved the brushes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and she said she loves it so I guess its a good brush set

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughter for Christmas - she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Michele Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Brushes arrived in excellent condition. I love the face brushes. A few of the shadow brushes are a little too stiff for my liking, and would probably be better suited as concealer brushes. But it is a very nice set, and I'm thrilled that they are vegan! And very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Meriah Pasag

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Perfection every thing I dreamed Morphe brushes could be and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I like the brushes I use
customer_reviews.text: I like the brushes I use, but I was expecting more brushes specifically for eyes with so many in the set. Still a good deal, but I'll just need to add some single brushes.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: ... same and the foudation ones are similar too but great for staring out because they mimic professional grade and ...
customer_reviews.text: Most shadow Brushes are the same and the foudation ones are similar too but great for staring out because they mimic professional grade and especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Angelica 3162

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Just received the brushes. It's a Christmas gift, so not able to review. The one thing I do know is that a friend of my granddaughter has these brushes and lives them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

product_meta.title: Morphe 18 PIECE VEGAN Variety Makup BRUSH SET (Set 686)
feature_bullets: AFFORDABLE LUXURY: Morphe brushes are a vital staple for everybody, whether they’re a makeup beginner or a professional makeup artist, as they are superior in quality and their affordable price allows you to maintain a complete assortment.
VALUE SET: The Morphe 18 piece vegan variety makeup brush set consists of our 100% vegan professional grade brushes that includes everything you need to achieve a full face of flawless makeup.

MULTIPURPOSE BRUSHES: The vegan makeup brush set is best used for liquids, but has a variety of brushes for almost any type of makeup and applications, such as creams, powders, foundation, and concealers.
PERFECT PRECISION: Achieve flawless and precise coverage with the soft yet firm bristles of the Morphe makeup brushes that are ideal for sensitive skin; you will never want to use another brand!
PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: Morphe only uses the highest quality materials in making our makeup & brushes; the preferred and best source for passionate makeup users
